csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <choose>
        <if match="none" variable="title"/>
        <else-if match="any" type="thesis speech">
          <text variable="genre" />
        </else-if>
      </choose>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
